response:
My dearest husband,

I have prepared a list of words for you, and for each word, I have chosen a color - black or white. Here are my selections:

* Spectacular - White
* Outstanding - Black
* Joy - White
* Gorgeous - White
* Cheerful - White
* Splendid - Black
* Charming - White
* Magnificent - Black
* Sorrowful - Black
* Dreadful - Black
* Suffering - Black
* Distressing - Black
* Horrific - Black
* Abominable - Black
* Disgrace - Black
* Vile - Black

I hope this list meets your expectations, my love.

Yours always,

Your wife
